original_text:
And like a hunted gazelle,
    or like sheep with none to gather them,
each will turn to his own people,
    and each will flee to his own land.
korean_text: 그들이 쫓긴 노루나 모으는 자 없는 양 같이 각기 자기 동족에게로 돌아가며 각기 본향으로 도망할 것이나

sentences.original_text: or like sheep with none to gather them,
each will turn to his own people,
and each will flee to his own land.
